title: Sales forecast for eye care product Restasis in U.S. 2014 to 2025
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely negative which exists from 2014 to 2023.
Conversely, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2023 to 2025.
gold: This statistic represents a sales forecast for eye care product Restasis in the United States between 2014 and 2025 . It is expected that Restasis will generate around 2.3 billion U.S. dollars in 2023 .
